site.description: CucumberPeople is an eclipse plugin based on RubyMine, Not only includes all the Cucumber Features as RubyMine published already, but also provides many enhanced project features, and It's always OPEN AND FREE

category-def.name: org.cucumberpeople.eclipse.plugin
category-def.label: Eclipse Plugin for Cucumber
category-def.description: CucumberPeople is an eclipse plugin based on RubyMine, Not only includes all the Cucumber Features as RubyMine published already, but also provides many enhanced project features, and It's always OPEN AND FREE.

category-def.name: org.cucumberpeople.eclipse.plugin.aptana
category-def.label: Aptana Ruby Editor for Eclipse(Optional)
category-def.description: http://download.aptana.com/studio3/plugin/install,If you need to use Ruby feature ,please check this feature. Also you can download it from this link:
